# L.A.I.T.H.49

### Logical Assistant for Intelligent Task Handling

My Personal Voice Assistant!
## Built With

![Csharp](https://img.shields.io/badge/csharp-512BD4.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=data%3Aimage%2Fsvg%2Bxml%3Bbase64%%3D&link=https%3A%2F%2Flearn.microsoft.com%2Fen-us%2Fdotnet%2Fcsharp%2Ftour-of-csharp%2F)


![Python](https://img.shields.io/badge/python-FFD43B?style=for-the-badge&logo=python)
## Features

- Use AI to answer any questions 
- Turn on/off my lights
- Open/Close my door
- Turn on my PS5 and open a game for me
- Tell the Date/Time
- Search up/Google anything
- Open/Search on YouTube
- Tell the local Weather
- Tell me the current day's Prayer Times
- Open my IDE
- Turn off/Restart my computer


## Roadmap

- [ ] Ability to interrupt L.A.I.T.H
- [ ] Improve the Audio Visualizer
- [ ] Send Text Messages  
- [ ] Improve the Audio Visualizer
  
## Acknowledgements

 - [Code for Prayer times are thanks to Nyong](https://github.com/nyongrand/pray-times)
